content.problem: Inconsistent commit messages make history hard to read and prevent automated changelog generation
content.solution: Use format: type(scope): description with standardized types
content.implementation: Install commitlint and husky: commitlint.config.js, package.json scripts
content.whyValuable: Enables automated changelogs, makes git history searchable, provides context for reviewers
content.howToApply: Add to any project with commitlint config and pre-commit hook
